news.title: Indian AI Startup Raises $30M to Expand Globally
news.summary: Bangalore-based AI company Trakto has raised $30 million in Series B funding to scale its AI-powered business solutions across India and other emerging markets. The startup focuses on providing AI-driven process automation, data analytics, and decision support tools for enterprises.

news.title: India's IT Giant TCS Partners with MIT on AI Research
news.summary: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), India's largest IT services company, has announced a new partnership with the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) to collaborate on cutting-edge AI research. The five-year program will focus on developing AI solutions for real-world business challenges.

news.title: Infosys Launches AI-Powered Automation Platform for Enterprises
news.summary: Indian IT services major Infosys has unveiled a new AI-driven automation platform called Infosys Topaz. The platform leverages advanced AI, machine learning, and intelligent automation capabilities to help enterprises streamline their business processes and drive digital transformation.

news.title: Indian Govt Announces $1 Billion Fund for AI Startups
news.summary: The Government of India has launched a $1 billion fund to support the growth of AI startups in the country. The initiative aims to accelerate the development and adoption of AI-powered solutions across sectors like healthcare, agriculture, education, and smart mobility.

news.title: Indian Stock Market Hits All-Time High on Tech Surge
news.summary: The Indian stock market reached a new record high today, driven by a surge in technology stocks. Shares of major Indian tech companies like Infosys, TCS, and Reliance Jio climbed to new peaks as investors piled into the sector amid strong earnings and growth prospects.

news.title: Sensex Surges 500 Points, Nifty Tops 18,000 on Positive Global Cues
news.summary: The Indian benchmark indices, Sensex and Nifty, rallied over 1% today, with the Nifty crossing the 18,000 mark. The gains were driven by positive global market sentiment and strong performance by Indian tech and banking stocks. Analysts expect the uptrend to continue in the near term.

news.title: Reliance Industries Shares Soar on Robust Q3 Results
news.summary: Shares of Reliance Industries, India's largest conglomerate, jumped by over 5% today after the company reported strong financial results for the third quarter of fiscal 2026. The company's refining and petrochemicals business performed well, driving the overall growth.

news.title: Indian Equity Benchmarks Close at Record Highs
news.summary: The Indian stock market closed at record highs today, with the Sensex and Nifty indices both reaching new all-time peaks. The rally was led by gains in technology, banking, and consumer stocks, reflecting the overall positive sentiment in the Indian economy.

news.title: India Announces Nationwide Elections for May 2026
news.summary: The Election Commission of India has announced that nationwide general elections will be held in May 2026. The elections will see the world's largest democracy choose its next central government. Key issues expected to dominate the campaign include the economy, job creation, and national security.

news.title: Ruling Party Unveils Election Manifesto, Promises Tax Cuts
news.summary: The ruling political party in India has released its election manifesto for the upcoming 2026 general elections. Key highlights include promises of personal income tax cuts, increased infrastructure spending, and measures to boost domestic manufacturing. The manifesto aims to appeal to the middle-class voter base.

news.title: Opposition Forms Grand Alliance for 2026 Indian Elections
news.summary: The major opposition parties in India have formed a united coalition to take on the ruling party in the 2026 general elections. The 'Grand Progressive Alliance' promises a common minimum program focused on job creation, agricultural reforms, and strengthening social welfare schemes if elected to power.

news.title: Indian Tech Sector Calls for Reforms Ahead of 2026 Polls
news.summary: India's thriving technology industry has outlined a wishlist of policy reforms it hopes to see implemented by the next government. Key demands include simplified tax structures, incentives for R&D, and measures to boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing. Industry leaders see the 2026 elections as a critical opportunity for pro-tech reforms.
